summary: REQ-24 (red glowing eyes horse asset) is not evidenced in the diff. REQ-23 (falling “X39” backdrop behind the horse) has a new canvas backdrop component with reduced-motion handling and cleanup, but the diff snippet of X39MatrixLaunchHeroBlock is truncated before showing where/if it is actually rendered in the horse visual area.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the launch horse hero image so the horse has clearly visible glowing red eyes, served as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated and referenced by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: No diff evidence shows an updated/added image under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor any change to the image reference in X39MatrixLaunchHeroBlock to point to a new red-eyes asset.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a subtle falling “X39” background effect behind the horse visual in the X39 Matrix launch hero block.
missing_requirements.reason: A new canvas component implementing an X/39 rain effect exists, but the provided X39MatrixLaunchHeroBlock diff is truncated before any JSX placement is shown; the diff evidence only shows the import, not that it is rendered behind the horse image in the right-side hero visual area.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed scrollIntoView behavior to respect prefers-reduced-motion when scrolling to token registration.
hallucinated_features.reason: This behavioral change is not part of REQ-23 or REQ-24 (which are strictly visual requirements for the horse hero area).
